txt.en: 'Very good, [placeholder]! That ought to keep them away from those folk for a bit!'

Nedda Pinleaf has asked you to seek out Harbingers of the Dead in the depths of Middle-earth.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Harbingers of the Dead can be found in the following skirmishes: Battle of the Twenty-first Hall, Battle of the Deep-way, Battle of the Way of Smiths, and Rescue in N청rz Gh창shu. You only need to complete three of the four listed quests today to advance this quest.</rgb>
Harbingers of the Dead are assaulting those who dwell in the depths of the world.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends.</rgb>
Complete 'Ill Omens: Battle of the Twenty-first Hall'

'[placeholder]!

'I've heard tell that the Harbingers of the Dead have grown bold enough to creep into the depths of the world. I don't even want to think what they want with all those Orcs and giants!

'Go on, and I'll be right behind you!'
Complete 'Ill Omens: Battle of the Deep-way'
Nedda Pinleaf can be found at the skirmish camps of Bree, Ost Galadh, and the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nYou should talk to Nedda Pinleaf.
Complete 'Ill Omens: Battle of the Way of Smiths'
Complete 'Ill Omens: Rescue in N청rz Gh창shu'
<rgb=#8373ff>A Harbinger of the Dead has appeared!</rgb>
